history: TTS !b Welcome to CMU Get Going. <break strength='strong'/> Your conversation will be recorded securely in order to help researchers improve voice-based assistants but your phone number will not be shared. <break strength='strong'/> By voluntarily continuing you confirm that you are 18 or older. <break time='1s'/> You are speaking to the ORANGE system. Please enter this into the survey immediately <break time='1s' />. </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER Ansley
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER Ansley
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER Apple by transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Okay, going to ansley st. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where would you like to leave from?
USER Benton Highland
TTS Okay, leaving from benton avenue. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER 11:03 a.m.
TTS Okay, travelling at 11:00 am.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER No.
TTS <speak> Sounds good. <break strength='strong' /> Let me know if you didn't understand a step, and I'll repeat it for you. </speak>
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 1 hour 9 minutes, and you will take 2 busses.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 9 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Brighton Rd at Benton avenue. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Yes.

TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 16 <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Liberty avenue at 6th St.</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 11:20am. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER test

USER yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Walk for about 1 min to Liberty avenuenue at Market Street. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Yes, I'm on.

TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 82 <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Beatty St at Penn avenue NS.</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 11:50am. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 2 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Ansley St, Pittsburgh, PA 15206, USA. </prosody> </speak>
